title: What are three examples of contaminated waste? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wastes that can be disposed off without causing any harm to anyone or anything can be disposed off harmlessly. Wastes that can harm environment (water bodies, air, etc), life are contaminated wastes. Examples of contaminated wastes are: hospital wastes, lead containing materials (batteries, etc), mercury containing materials, untreated industrial effluents, non-degradable materials like plastic, etc
